# Resources


Useful resources for next steps.

* Many Seurat Vignettes: https://satijalab.org/seurat/index.html
* Ochestrating Single Cell Analysis with bioconductor: https://bioconductor.org/books/release/OSCA/
* Bunch of useful links listed here: https://monashbioinformaticsplatform.github.io/Single-Cell-Workshop/
* TidySeurat

* Demo 10X data is here - variations on the technolgy; https://www.10xgenomics.com/resources/datasets

Seurat command cheat sheet. For when you're trying to figure out how to find something in the object: https://satijalab.org/seurat/articles/essential_commands.html



* https://satijalab.org/seurat/archive/v3.1/de_vignette.html Differential expresison in SEurat.
